Description.Text: Brand new hotel combining inviting experiences, innovative spaces, and the modern essentials needed for the traveler on the go. The hotel offers free parking, free Wi-Fi and a hot breakfast buffet.
Located right on Lake Buena vista, block away from Disney's Springs and within walking distance to several dining options.
Gallery Menu offers fresh 24/7 with mouthwatering options including signature flatbreads, StarbucksÂ® specialty coffees & teas, premium beer, wine and cocktails
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
